name: tron-legacy-syntax-cp

0.6.3.name: tron-legacy-syntax-cp
0.6.3.description: A fork of a dark syntax theme to play along with tron-legacy-ui-cp

readme:
# Tron Legacy

Syntaxtheme based on Tron Legacy. Don't really know how this behaves without my Tron Legacy UI. I would recommend them together. They're a good couple.

More notes/updates to come! Thanks for checking it out!

Screenshot includes both my syntax and ui theme files
![A screenshot of your theme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cparadeise/tron-legacy-syntax-atom/master/screen-shot.png)
